detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a small embroidery detail on the chest, a ribbed frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and wide ribbing at the hem.

Studio Collection. Long, straight skirt in stretch twill made from a wool blend. High waist with a zip, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a concealed safety button at the back. Twisted side seams and a high slit at the front. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Glittery ribbon chokers with a fastener at the back. Width approx. 1 cm. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue around the shoulders to the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Cropped top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Open back with crossover lacing and lace trims at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a smocked seam under the bust.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with reversible sequins on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lace hem. No fasteners.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with double flounces and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Jersey lining.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with plastic beads and sparkly stones. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft jersey with short flounced sleeves and gathers in the sides for a good fit over the tummy.
Wide sports top in fast-drying slub jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with low dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Jumper in a chunky, rib-knit cotton blend containing some wool in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Satin halterneck jumpsuit with a wrapover feature and concealed button at the front, straight legs with creases and a  concealed zip in the side.
Velour jumpsuit with a lined hood, zip at the front and a wide elasticated seam at the waist. Front pockets, long sleeves with ribbed jersey cuffs and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Skirt in a recycled polyester jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back and patch front pockets. Lined.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastic at the hems.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Mules in imitation leather with crossover straps at the front, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.
Baby Exclusive. Trainer socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Fine-knit socks.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with broderie anglaise, a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Low crotch, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, welt back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and skinny legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y).
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Derby shoes with elongated toes and lacing at the top. Canvas linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit T-shirt in a soft viscose blend with slightly wider ribbing around the neckline.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline with pleats  and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Thin metal chain anklets, one with plastic beads and one with metal pendants. Adjustable length 23-26.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Six pairs of earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2.2 cm to 4 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt with details. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar.
Imitation leather card holder with a zipped compartment and four card slots on the back. Size 7x12.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, fitted shirt in satin with lace sections. Large, pointed collar, buttons down the front, a tapered waist and extra-long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Knee-length shorts in patterned cotton twill with a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Top in waffled slub jersey with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, short sleeves, visible seam down the back and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-style jumper in a soft, loose-knit Tencel™ lyocell and cashmere blend containing glittery threads. Extra-long sleeves, a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a wider ribbed trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined printed swimsuit.
Three-strand necklace of different metal chains, the longest with a face-shaped pendant. Adjustable length, 41-49 cm.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Calf-length dress in viscose jersey with a deep, wrapover V-neck at the back, short sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top. Gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and wide legs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.

Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Small backpack in a patterned weave with a handle and zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps. Outer compartment with a hook and loop fastening and a padded back plate and base. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Blouse in an airy modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with smocked cuffs.

5-pocket, low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes and a zip in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers in felt with a frill at the top, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Checked linings and insoles in a contrasting colour, and rubber soles.
Cap with a reversible sequin motif on the front, covered button on top and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Lightly padded sweatband.

Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and lace trims around the sleeves and hems. Unlined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with a glittery elastic waistband.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a roll edge around the neckline, raw-edge sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
